title: Denmark - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 11,400 BDT (Embassy) + 1,655 BDT (VFS Service Fee) + 4,000 BDT (Chologhuri Processing Fee) + Travel Insurance & Notary extra
validity: Typically up to 90 days within 180 days (Schengen short-stay)

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport with at least 3 months validity beyond intended stay and 2 blank pages
Completed and signed Schengen Visa Application Cover Letter and VU2 form from ApplyVisa
Visa fee payment receipt (online)
Strong purpose of visit (tourism or visiting family/friends) supported by documentation
Proof of employment, business, or student status
Proof of personal financial means and documents showing establishment in Bangladesh (property, partnerships, family)
Health and travel insurance valid in Schengen area (minimum €30,000 coverage)
Hotel booking, flight reservation, and travel itinerary (arranged by Chologhuri)
Invitation and identity documents from host if visiting family/friends

details.title: Required Documents
items: Printed and signed Schengen Visa Application Cover Letter from ApplyVisa
Printed receipt for online payment of visa fee
Completed and signed VU2 form
Passport and all previous passports
Passport-size photo (35mm x 45mm, bright background, color)
Personal cover letter (provided by Chologhuri)
Employer’s letter, NOC, visiting card, employment certificate, salary slips, and tax certificates (last 3 years)
For self-employed: trade license, incorporation certificate, company bank statements (6 months), income tax return
For students: enrollment proof, leave of absence letter with official contact details
Original personal bank statement (6 months); also company statement if applicable
Documents proving financial/property ownership and family ties (e.g. marriage certificate, children's birth certificates)
Travel insurance (original and photocopy)
Hotel reservation, flight booking, and itinerary (provided by Chologhuri)
If visiting family/friends: invitation letter, documents proving host's identity (passport, ID, residence permit)
Photocopies of passport data page, previous visas (Schengen, US, UK, Canada), and Bangladesh residence permit (for non-Bangladeshi applicants)
